meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>shining</kanji> <kanji>peace</kanji> time was a time known as the <vocabulary>Showa Era</vocabulary>. This can also refer to the <vocabulary>Showa Emperor</vocabulary> or just <vocabulary>Showa</vocabulary> itself. Everything Showa is here.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
